column4: hmm so i have been runing ubuntu 5.10 for quite a while and i just got an old netgeer pcmcia network card WG511 (802.11 G, V2, MADE IN TIWAN)
and i'm trying to get it working
but i'm not sure how i can "install" the hardware ...
i plugged in the card before i started ubuntu but ... no lights turned on ..
you have to modprobe the drivers i think
i thought i tried ... using:  sudo modprobe prism54
